<title level="1" right="Trait">[Sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=145)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 636 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

This effect can cause a creature to fall asleep or get drowsy.
name: Sleep
